title: Ground Floor 2 Bed 1 Bath Coming Soon 🌞
posting_body: ['Apartment 1-05', 'This beautiful apartment has a new carpet installed, fresh paint throughout the apartment, and a grand spacious closet!', 'Our open, spacious floorplan is the perfect space for a variety of furniture sizes and styles.', 'With additional storage throughout the apartment, you will have no problem keeping your new home clutter-free!', 'The earliest available tour is 9.15.22', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Bart Plaza Apartments is conveniently located just minutes from the Castro Valley Bart Station, grocery shopping, clothing shops, and various restaurants.', 'Availability date:9/15/2022', 'Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes: Dogs Allowed: breed restrictions apply •$500 Deposit •30 lb Weight Limit •2 Pet Limit Cats Allowed •$500 Deposit •2 Pet Limit Birds, Fish and Reptiles Allowed', 'Leasing options:12 month lease', 'Amenities', 'Laundry: two laundry facilities', 'Appliances: Gas ranges, refrigerator', 'Facilities and Recreation:2 pools, 1 fitness center, Dog park', 'Security and Access: Secured building', 'Additional features: Less than 5 minutes from Castro Valley Bart Station', 'To Qualify: Applicants should have verifiable income of 2.5 times the rent amount, at least 12 months of positive rental history, and past credit screening to include a score of 500 or higher.', 'Visit us at <URL>', 'Offered by: FPI Management', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Apartments.', 'Com Link - <URL>']
